text:
Savioke | Engineering | San Jose, CA | ONSITE

Savioke builds delivery robots for hospitality and logistics. Headquartered in San Jose, California USA.

Currently hiring for roles in engineering (mechanical, and internal software/cloud tools), operations and production. Friendly to visa and interns.

Robotics is inherently multi-discipline. If you have wizard skills, please reach out. I am awilson at company name dot com

Website: http://savioke.com/ Lever Hiring Page: https://jobs.lever.co/savioke.com
